PageTitle: display mpls te tunnel path expanded
FuncDef: The display mpls te tunnel path expanded command displays expanded path attributes of a tunnel on the local node.
CLIs: display mpls te tunnel path expanded lsp-id <ingress-lsr-id> <session-id> <local-lsp-id>
display mpls te tunnel path expanded tunnel-name <tunnel-name> [ lsp-id <ingress-lsr-id> <session-id> <local-lsp-id> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the ingress LSR ID of a tunnel.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a session ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the LSP ID value.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 65535.

Specifies the tunnel name.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Examples: <HUAWEI> display mpls te tunnel path expanded tunnel-name A2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If no tunnel name is specified, path attributes of all MPLS TE tunnels are displayed.The system records and displays path information only after the mpls te record-route command has been configured.
